title: Wi-Fi Security Testing: Evil Twin & VPN Protection
description: Built a custom OpenWRT lab with a GL.iNet Mango router and Pineapple clone to simulate Evil Twin attacks and test how VPN encryption protects against Man-in-the-Middle exploits

title: Garmin Watch App
description: Work in progress... Developing a Garmin watch app using Monkey C to help with productivity and time management with the Pomodoro Technique.
